attributes.action: Allow the building of a glass viewing tower on the Humber Bridge
attributes.background: also a visitor centre and a mixed-used development consisting of a 60-bed hotel and 75,000 sq ft of office space – all with associated landscaping and car parking. It was claimed the development would have created more than 1,100 jobs and generated about £17m to the local economy.

rejection.details:
This decision was taken by East Riding of Yorkshire Council, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can start a petition to the Council here:

http://www2.eastriding.gov.uk/council/committees/petitions/
